content.question: Which of the following best describes the data in the line graph?

choices.label: Chinese exports were worth over 1 trillion dollars in 2007.
Chinese exports were greater in 2003 than in 2009.
Chinese imports were almost worth 1 trillion dollars in 2002.
Chinese imports were greater than Chinese exports in 2010.

content.answer: Chinese exports were worth over 1 trillion dollars in 2007.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.1: Impact of Global Economic and Technological Forces
